Package com.dhemery.network

Send and receive network messages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Endpoint
    A service endpoint at which resources can be accessed.
    Resource
    An identifiable network entity that responds to messages.
    ResourceFactory
    A factory that creates resources.
    SerializingEndpoint
    Wraps an endpoint to allow it to send and return serializable objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodecEndpoint
    An endpoint that uses a Codec to serialize and deserialize objects.
    PublishingResource
    Wraps a resource and publishes events about its communications.
    PublishingResourceFactory
    A resource factory that wraps another factory's Resources in PublishingResource wrappers.
    ResourceFactoryBasedEndpoint
    An endpoint that delegates the creation of resources to a factory.
    URLResource
    A resource accessible through a URL.
    URLResourceFactory
    A resource factory that supplies URLResources.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NetworkException
    Reports a problem communicating with a resource.

Package com.dhemery.network Description

Send and receive network messages.
